column4: I cant change resolution to anything other than 1280x1024, (Specifically i want 1024x768) on my 17" CRT ( Radeon X1950 Pro), I get blackScreen. I installed envy, I did the dpkg-reconfigure, I donno what else to do, HELP MEH!
Why would you want a worse resolution anyway lol
coz my CRT monitor can only display 1280x1024 on 60hz
